Detailed Description

Routines for servo optimization, filtering, etc.

Function Documentation

static double servo_phi_margin ( double *  fcross,
const dmat *  nu,
const cmat *  Hol 
) [static]

With given open loop transfer function, compute its cross over frequency and phase margin.

Written: 2010-06-11

Tested OK: 2010-06-11

Parameters:
[out] fcross Cross over frequency
[out] nu frequency grid
[in] Hol open loop transfer function defined on nu 
00037                     {
00038     if(cabs(Hol->p[0])<1){
00039     error("Hol is less than 1 from the beginning\n");
00040     }
00041 
00042     int found=0;
00043     double fc=0;
00044     double phi=0;
00045     for(long i=0; i<nu->nx; i++){
00046     double val=cabs(Hol->p[i]);
00047     if(val<1){
00048         double valpre=cabs(Hol->p[i-1]);
00049         double logvalpre=log10(valpre);//positive. log10(val) is negative.
00050         double rat=logvalpre/(logvalpre-log10(val));
00051         fc=pow(10,log10(nu->p[i-1])*(1-rat)+log10(nu->p[i])*rat);
00052         double phi0=atan2(cimag(Hol->p[i-1]), creal(Hol->p[i-1]));
00053         double phi1=atan2(cimag(Hol->p[i]), creal(Hol->p[i]));
00054         //if(fabs(phi0-phi1)>2*pi)
00055         double diff=(phi1-phi0)/(2*M_PI);//positive.
00056         diff=diff-round(diff);
00057         phi1=phi0+diff*2*M_PI;
00058         phi=pow(10,log10(phi0)*(1-rat)+log10(phi1)*rat);
00059         double nphi=phi/(2*M_PI);
00060         nphi=nphi-floor(nphi)-1;
00061         phi=nphi*2*M_PI;//from -2*M_PI to 0.
00062         found=1;
00063         break;
00064     }
00065     }
00066     if(!found){
00067     error("Hol doesn't fall to below 1.\n");
00068     }
00069     *fcross=fc;
00070     return phi+M_PI;
00071 }

dmat* servo_typeII_optim ( double *  ress,
double *  resn,
const dmat *  psdin,
double  fs,
double  lgsdt,
double  sigman 
)

Optimize the type II servo gains by balancing errors due to noise and signal propagation.

Written: 2010-06-11

Tested OK: 2010-06-11 

00082                                                     {
00083     /*The upper end must be nyquist freq so that noise transfer can be
00084       computed. But we need to captuer the turbulence PSD beyond nyquist freq,
00085       which are uncorrectable.
00086      */
00087     dmat *psdx=dnew_ref(psdin->p,          psdin->nx,1);
00088     dmat *psdy=dnew_ref(psdin->p+psdin->nx,psdin->nx,1);
00089      
00090     //Compute error in un-corretable part of the PSD
00091     dmat *nu2=dlogspace(log10(fs/2),3,1000);//Frequencies that no correction can be made.
00092     dmat *psd2=dinterp1log(psdx,psdy,nu2);
00093   
00094     double rms2_sig=psd_intelog(nu2->p, psd2->p, nu2->nx);
00095     dfree(nu2); dfree(psd2);
00096 
00097     dmat *nu=dlogspace(-3,log10(fs/2),1000);
00098     dmat *psd=dinterp1log(psdx,psdy,nu);
00099     cmat *s=cnew(nu->nx, 1);
00100     dcomplex pi2i=2*M_PI*I;
00101     double Ts=1./fs;
00102     cmat *Hsys=cnew(nu->nx,1);
00103     cmat *Hwfs=cnew(nu->nx,1);
00104     dcomplex expsTs,Hdac,Hmir,Hlag,Hint;
00105     Hmir=1;//DM
00106     for(long i=0; i<s->nx; i++){
00107     s->p[i]=pi2i*nu->p[i];
00108     expsTs=1-cexp(-s->p[i]*Ts);
00109     Hwfs->p[i]=expsTs/(Ts*s->p[i]);
00110     Hdac=Hwfs->p[i];
00111     Hlag=cexp(-s->p[i]*lgsdt);//lag
00112     Hint=1./expsTs;
00113     Hsys->p[i]=Hwfs->p[i]*Hlag*Hint*Hdac*Hmir*Hint;
00114     }
00115     double g0_min;
00116     if(fs<100){
00117     g0_min=0.01;
00118     }else{
00119     g0_min=0.01;
00120     }
00121     double g0=g0_min;
00122     cmat *Hol=cnew(nu->nx,1);
00123     double margin, fcross;
00124     double rms_tot_save=INFINITY, rms_sig_save=0, rms_n_save=0;
00125     double g0_save=0, a_save=0, T_save=0;
00126 
00127     while(1){
00128     //Open loop transfer function without phase lead
00129     cadd(&Hol, 0, Hsys, g0);
00130     margin=servo_phi_margin(&fcross, nu, Hol);
00131     double phineed=M_PI/4-margin;//want to ensure PI/4 margin
00132     double a=(1-sin(phineed))/(1+sin(phineed));
00133     double f0=fcross*sqrt(a);
00134     double T=1./(2.*M_PI*f0);
00135     double g=sqrt(a);
00136 
00137     double rms_sig=0, sum_n=0, sum_1=0;
00138     for(long i=0; i<s->nx; i++){
00139         dcomplex Hlead=(1+T*s->p[i])/(1+a*T*s->p[i]);
00140         dcomplex Holt=Hol->p[i]*Hlead*g;
00141         dcomplex Hrej=1./(1.+Holt);
00142         dcomplex Hcl=Holt*Hrej;
00143         dcomplex Hn=Hcl/Hwfs->p[i];
00144         //fixme: cabs(Hrej)*cabs(Hrej) or cabs(Href*Href)?
00145         rms_sig+=psd->p[i]*creal(Hrej*conj(Hrej))*nu->p[i];
00146         sum_n+=pow(cabs(Hn),2)*nu->p[i];
00147         sum_1+=nu->p[i];
00148     }
00149     
00150     double dlognu=(log(nu->p[nu->nx-1])-log(nu->p[0]))/(nu->nx-1);
00151     rms_sig*=dlognu;
00152     sum_n*=dlognu;
00153     sum_1*=dlognu;
00154     double gain_n=(sum_n/sum_1);
00155     double rms_n=gain_n*sigman;
00156     double rms_tot=rms_sig+rms_n;
00157     if(rms_tot<rms_tot_save && gain_n<=1){
00158         g0_save=g0*g;//g is an additional factor.
00159         a_save=a;
00160         T_save=T;
00161         g0=g0+0.01;
00162         rms_tot_save=rms_tot;
00163         rms_sig_save=rms_sig;
00164         rms_n_save=rms_n;
00165     }else{
00166         break;
00167     }
00168     }
00169 
00170     dfree(nu);
00171     dfree(psdx);
00172     dfree(psdy);
00173     dfree(psd);
00174     cfree(Hsys);
00175     cfree(Hwfs);
00176     cfree(Hol);
00177     cfree(s);
00178     dmat *gm=dnew(3,1);
00179     gm->p[0]=g0_save;
00180     gm->p[1]=a_save;
00181     gm->p[2]=T_save;
00182     *resn=rms_n_save;
00183     *ress=rms_sig_save+rms2_sig;
00184     return gm;
00185 }

cmat* servo_typeII_Hol ( const dmat *  gain,
double  fs,
double  lgsdt 
)

Compute adaptive optics open loop transfer function of the type II servo with lead filter. 

00189                                                                  {
00190     dmat *nu=dlogspace(-3,3,1000);
00191 
00192     dcomplex pi2i=2*M_PI*I;
00193     double Ts=1./fs;
00194     double g0=gain->p[0];
00195     double a=gain->p[1];
00196     double T=gain->p[2];
00197     dcomplex s,expsTs,Hdac,Hmir,Hlag,Hint,Hsys,Hwfs,Hlead;
00198     Hmir=1;//DM
00199     cmat *Hol=cnew(nu->nx, 3);
00200     PCMAT(Hol, pHol);
00201     for(long i=0; i<nu->nx; i++){
00202     s=pi2i*nu->p[i];
00203     expsTs=1-cexp(-s*Ts);
00204     Hwfs=expsTs/(Ts*s);
00205     Hdac=Hwfs;
00206     Hlag=cexp(-s*lgsdt);//lag
00207     Hint=1./expsTs;
00208     Hsys=Hwfs*Hlag*Hint*Hdac*Hmir*Hint;
00209     Hlead=(1+T*s)/(1+a*T*s);
00210     pHol[0][i]=nu->p[i];
00211     pHol[1][i]=Hsys*g0*Hlead;
00212     pHol[2][i]=Hwfs;
00213     //Hol=Hsys*g0*Hlead;
00214     //Hrej=1./(1+Hol);
00215     }
00216     dfree(nu);
00217     return Hol;
00218 }

double servo_typeII_residual ( const dmat *  gain,
const dmat *  psdin,
double  fs,
double  lgsdt 
)

Compute the residual error after servo rejection of a type II servo given the gain.

Written: 2010-06-11

Tested OK: 2010-06-11 

00227                                                                                           {
00228     dmat *nu=dlogspace(-3,3,1000);//Should go beyond Nyquist freq. Hrej=1 for nu>fs/2.
00229     dmat *psdx=dnew_ref(psdin->p,          psdin->nx,1);
00230     dmat *psdy=dnew_ref(psdin->p+psdin->nx,psdin->nx,1);  
00231     dmat *psd=dinterp1log(psdx,psdy,nu);
00232     dcomplex pi2i=2*M_PI*I;
00233     double Ts=1./fs;
00234 
00235     dcomplex s,expsTs,Hdac,Hmir,Hlag,Hint,Hsys,Hwfs,Hol,Hrej,Hlead;
00236     Hmir=1;//DM
00237     double g0=gain->p[0];
00238     double a=gain->p[1];
00239     double T=gain->p[2];
00240     double rms_sig=0;
00241     for(long i=0; i<nu->nx; i++){
00242     s=pi2i*nu->p[i];
00243     expsTs=1-cexp(-s*Ts);
00244     Hwfs=expsTs/(Ts*s);
00245     Hdac=Hwfs;
00246     Hlag=cexp(-s*lgsdt);//lag
00247     Hint=1./expsTs;
00248     Hsys=Hwfs*Hlag*Hint*Hdac*Hmir*Hint;
00249     Hlead=(1+T*s)/(1+a*T*s);
00250     Hol=Hsys*g0*Hlead;
00251     Hrej=1./(1+Hol);
00252     rms_sig+=psd->p[i]*pow(cabs(Hrej),2)*nu->p[i];//we integrate f(nu)nu d(log(nu))
00253     }
00254     double dlognu=(log(nu->p[nu->nx-1])-log(nu->p[0]))/(nu->nx-1);
00255     rms_sig*=dlognu;
00256     dfree(psdx);
00257     dfree(psdy);
00258     dfree(nu);
00259     dfree(psd);
00260     return rms_sig;
00261 }

00267     st->initialized=1;

void servo_typeII_filter ( SERVO_S *  st,
dmat *  merr,
double  dtngs,
const dmat *  gain 
)

Apply type II servo filter on measurement error and output integrator.

gain must be 3x1 or 3x5. 

00278                                                                                  {
00279 
00280     if(!merr) return;
00281     PDMAT(gain,pgain);
00282     if(!st->initialized){
00283     st->initialized=1;
00284     st->mlead=dnew(merr->nx,1);
00285     st->merrlast=dnew(merr->nx,1);
00286     st->mintfirst=dnew(merr->nx,1);
00287     st->mint=dnew(merr->nx,1);
00288     }
00289 
00290     int indmul=0;
00291     if(gain->nx!=3){
00292     error("Wrong format in gain\n");
00293     }
00294     int nmod=0;//error.
00295     if(merr->ny==1){
00296     nmod=merr->nx;
00297     }else{
00298     if(merr->nx!=1){
00299         error("Don't handle this case\n");
00300     }
00301     nmod=merr->ny;
00302     }
00303 
00304     if(gain->ny==nmod){
00305     indmul=1;
00306     }else if(gain->ny==1){
00307     indmul=0;
00308     }else{
00309     error("Wrong format\n");
00310     }
00311 
00312     double gg,ga,gs;
00313     for(int imod=0; imod<nmod; imod++){
00314     int indm=imod * indmul;
00315     gg=pgain[indm][0];
00316     ga=pgain[indm][1];
00317     gs=pgain[indm][2]/dtngs;
00318     
00319     st->mlead->p[imod] = (gg/(2*ga*gs+1))*(st->mlead->p[imod]*(2*ga*gs-1)
00320                            +merr->p[imod]*(2*gs+1)
00321                            -st->merrlast->p[imod]*(2*gs-1));
00322     }
00323     dcp(&st->merrlast, merr);
00324     dadd(&st->mintfirst,1, st->mlead,1);
00325     dadd(&st->mint, 1,st->mintfirst,1);
00326 }

dmat* servo_typeII_test ( dmat *  mideal,
dmat *  gain,
double  dtlgs,
int  dtrat 
)

test type II filter with ideal measurement to make sure it is implemented correctly. 

00330                                                                           {
00331     int nmod=mideal->nx;
00332     PDMAT(mideal,pmideal);
00333     dmat *merr=dnew(nmod,1);
00334     dmat *mreal=NULL;
00335     dmat *mres=dnew(nmod,mideal->ny);
00336     dmat *meas=NULL;
00337     SERVO_S *st2t=calloc(1, sizeof(SERVO_S));
00338     PDMAT(mres,pmres);
00339     for(int istep=0; istep<mideal->ny; istep++){
00340     memcpy(merr->p, pmideal[istep], nmod*sizeof(double));
00341     dadd(&merr, 1, mreal, -1);
00342     memcpy(pmres[istep],merr->p,sizeof(double)*nmod);
00343     if(istep % dtrat == 0){
00344         dzero(meas);
00345     }
00346     dadd(&meas, 1, merr, 1);//average the error.
00347     dcp(&mreal, st2t->mint);
00348     if((istep+1) % dtrat == 0){
00349         dscale(meas, 1./dtrat);
00350         servo_typeII_filter(st2t, meas, dtlgs*dtrat, gain);
00351         //servo_typeI_filter(st2t, meas, .5);
00352     }
00353     }
00354     dfree(merr);
00355     dfree(mreal);
00356     dfree(meas);
00357     servo_free(st2t);
00358     return mres;
00359 }

dmat* psd2temp ( dmat *  psdin,
double  dt,
double  N,
mt_state *  rstat 
)

Generate random time series using temporal PSD. 

00364                                                                     {
00365     double df=1./(N*dt);
00366     dmat *f=dlinspace(df,(N-1)*df,N);
00367     dmat *psdx=dnew_ref(psdin->p,          psdin->nx,1);
00368     dmat *psdy=dnew_ref(psdin->p+psdin->nx,psdin->nx,1);
00369     dmat *psd2=dinterp1log(psdx,psdy,f);
00370     dfree(f);
00371     double sqdf=sqrt(df);
00372     dfree(psdx);
00373     dfree(psdy);
00374     cmat *psdc=cnew(N,1);
00375     cfft2plan(psdc, -1);
00376     for(long i=0; i<psd2->nx; i++){
00377     psdc->p[i]=sqrt(psd2->p[i])*sqdf*(randn(rstat)+I*randn(rstat));
00378     }
00379     cfft2(psdc,-1);
00380     creal2d(&psd2,0,psdc,1);
00381     cfree(psdc);
00382     //transpose.
00383     psd2->ny=psd2->nx;
00384     psd2->nx=1;
00385     return psd2;
00386 }

double psd_intelog ( double *  nu,
double *  psd,
long  n 
)

Integrated a PSF that defines on logrithmically spaced grid nu. 

00400                                                    {
00401     double dlognu=(log(nu[n-1])-log(nu[0]))/(n-1);
00402     if((log(nu[1])-log(nu[0])-dlognu)>1.e-4){
00403     error("Nu is not logirthmic spaced\n");
00404     }
00405     double rms_sig=0;
00406     for(long i=0; i<n; i++){
00407     rms_sig+=psd[i]*nu[i];
00408     }   
00409     rms_sig*=dlognu;
00410     return rms_sig;
00411 }
